Package org.knime.core.webui.node.port

Class PortViewManager

java.lang.Object
org.knime.core.webui.node.port.PortViewManager
public final class PortViewManager extends Object
Manages (web-ui) port view instances and provides associated functionality.
Author:
Martin Horn, KNIME GmbH, Konstanz, Germany, Benjamin Moser, KNIME GmbH, Konstanz, Germany

  • Method Details

    • registerPortViews

      public static void registerPortViews(org.knime.core.node.port.PortType portType, List<PortViewManager.PortViewDescriptor> viewDescriptors, List<Integer> configuredIndices, List<Integer> executedIndices)
      Associate a PortType with one or several PortViewManager.PortViewDescriptors.
      Parameters:
      portType - The given port type.
      viewDescriptors - The views to associate with this port type.
      configuredIndices - Indices into viewDescriptors of views that are to be displayed when the node is in "configured" state.
      executedIndices - Indices into viewDescriptors of views that are to be displayed when the node is in "executed" state.

    • registerPortViews

      Associate a PortObject-class with one or several PortViewManager.PortViewDescriptors.
      Parameters:
      portObjectClass - The given port type.
      viewDescriptors - The views to associate with this port type.
      configuredIndices - Indices into viewDescriptors of views that are to be displayed when the node is in "configured" state.
      executedIndices - Indices into viewDescriptors of views that are to be displayed when the node is in "executed" state.
